summary: So after I posted my last video, @mumrik-maiden asked if I could sync 90s Snufkin’s voice to Moominvalley Snufkin, so I tried it...
caption: So after I posted my last video, @mumrik-maiden asked if I could sync 90s Snufkin’s voice to Moominvalley Snufkin, so I tried it out! (Also a bonus with the reverse synced as well because I was having too much fun lol).

reblog.comment: So after I posted my last video, @mumrik-maiden asked if I could sync 90s Snufkin’s voice to Moominvalley Snufkin, so I tried it out! (Also a bonus with the reverse synced as well because I was having too much fun lol).

blog.name: thefearisoneself
blog.title: You know. Me, Chad of Camelot.
blog.description: Hello! Please call me Jir! While I reblog lots of things my art is all under my Moominvalley tag, please check it out! I'm a 21 year old girl with High functioning Autism from Canada. My current biggest fandom is Moomins with my favourite character being Snufkin. I am also a fan of Wander over Yonder, Star vs the Forces of Evil, Steven Universe, Ducktales, Undertale, Gravity Falls, the Adventure Zone, OK KO and We Bare Bears. If you have any questions or just want to tell me something, go right ahead, don't be afraid to ask! Just please nothing rude.

summary: I am REEAALLY digging this accidental modern/rancher AU I ended up with. There was supposed to be a Joxter to go with this but I...
caption:
I am REEAALLY digging this accidental modern/rancher AU I ended up with.

There was supposed to be a Joxter to go with this but I finished this at  5 am and I couldn’t stay up to work on the other one.

There’s a bunch of drawing I have in mind for this AU. All the characters are involved but I’m big lonely lately so it’s all probably gonna be focused around Joxter, Snufkin, Mymble, and Little My for now.

summary:
Under The Moomin Spell
So I found out about this wild series of books and tv shows only in January of this year (2019) when I...
body:
Under The Moomin Spell

So I found out about this wild series of books and tv shows only in January of this year (2019) when I looked up the lyrics of Cavetown’s “Lemonboy”. If you don’t already know he has a lyric in it that goes “Like Snufkin and Little My, we’ll get around wherever”. So naturally I was curious as to what these two characters were from and that’s how I came across the Moomin series. I fell down a small rabbit hole of it, admired the character design of Snufkin and pretty much forgot about it. Then a few months later in April, I find my friend and roommate @nextbigaiello watching it on YouTube in our apartment and again my interest was piqued. This time though I fell down a much bigger hole and started watching the 90s series in its entirety. I started looking up more lore on it and even drawing Snufkin and Joxter in my sketchbook. I figured it would be a little phase of mine where I get really obsessed with itfor a small period of time and then move onto something else but for the life of me, I can’t get that forest imp and those funky little hippos out of my head. Trying to explain this affection is hard because “well it’s a kids show right?” Or “they’re children books”. I cannot understand why this series has such a hold on me but it truly does. It’s idyllic and beautiful and makes me long for the forest and simpler life. I’ve always loved nature and since I live in Chicago, I rarely get to be around it so watching it really makes me nostalgic. Speaking of nostalgia, the opening theme of the 2019 Moominvalley hits me incredibly hard. Its like I’m nostalgic for something I’ve only truly known about for a few months yet I feel like I’ve known it forever. It’s just so sweet and sincere. Here I am, an almost whole ass adult getting emotional over a Finnish chidrens series from the 1940s. But I love it and I’m unapologetic for that. I feel as though Tove’s wonderful creation will stay with me for a very very long time and it is truly something I will never get over.

tags: I hope it's useful to someone lol
title: Moominverse timeline
body:
Assumptions made:

  1. Trolls and other sentient creatures age like humans.
  2. Mymble procreates at an averaged rate of 1 offspring per year.
  3. The ages of characters are arbitrarily established by me, but I tried to make them as reasonable as possible.
  4. Year 0 is the year of Comet in Moominland.

Year -34

  • Moominpappa found at the threshold of Hemulen aunt’s orphanage.

Year -19

  • Events described in Moominpappa’s Memoirs take place.
  • Moominpappa is 15 (young enough to still live in the orphanage, big enough to build a house himself (I guess, I never personally built a house as a 15 year old, but I assume I could if I had to)).
  • The Muddler is 16 (he seems quite immature, but I guess you can get married at 16 if you live in  a lawless place). Same goes for The Fuzzy.
  • The Joxter is 20 (that’s my personal opinion).
  • Fredrikson/Hodgkins is in his 30s.
  • Mymble junior is 15 (she has 14 younger siblings).
  • Mymble senior is somewhere in her 30s, depending on at what age she had Mymble.
  • Little My is born this year.
  • I guess Moominmamma is also like 15.

Year -12

  • Snufkin is born, his parents fuck right off so he has no idea who they were.

Year -10

  • Moomintroll is born.

Year -8

  • Sniff is born, his parents drop him off at Moomins’ and fuck right off.

Year 0

  • Events of Comet in Moominland take place. Moomin is 10, Sniff is 8 (he’s a baby) and Snufkin is 12.
  • Snorkmaiden is also 10 and Sork is 14 (big enough to take care of himself and his sister, not big enough to be above playing with kids).

Year 1

  • Events of Finn Family Moomintroll take place.
  • Moominpappa writes his memoirs, also long lost parents arrive to reunite with their children.
  • Little My (20) first appears in the Moominvalley, visiting with her mum and siblings (34 plus Mymble junior - we know their number fortunately, and with our assumption they are like a radiocarbon).
  • If you’re curious: Moominparents are 35, Joxter is 40, Mymble senior is in her 50s and Mymble junior is 35, The Muddler and The Fuzzy are 36.

Year 2

  • Events of Moominsummer Maddness and Moominland Winter take place. 
  • Moomintroll and Snorkmaiden  are 12, Snufkin is 14 (really young age to become a dad), Little My is 21 and Mymble is 36.

Year 3

  • Events of Tales from Moominvalley take place.
  • Moomintroll and Snorkmaiden are 13, Snufkin is 15, Sniff is 11, Little My is 22.

Year 4

  • Events of Moominpappa at Sea and Moominvalley in November take place.
  • Moomintroll is 14, Moominparents are 38, Snufkin is 16, Little My is 23 and Mymble is 38.

  • Events described in Moominpappa’s Memoirs take place.
  • Moominpappa is 15 (young enough to still live in the orphanage, big enough to build a house himself (I guess, I never personally built a house as a 15 year old, but I assume I could if I had to)).
  • The Muddler is 16 (he seems quite immature, but I guess you can get married at 16 if you live in  a lawless place). Same goes for The Fuzzy.
  • The Joxter is 20 (that’s my personal opinion).
  • Fredrikson/Hodgkins is in his 30s.
  • Mymble junior is 15 (she has 14 younger siblings).
  • Mymble senior is somewhere in her 30s, depending on at what age she had Mymble.
  • Little My is born this year.
  • I guess Moominmamma is also like 15.

Year -12

  • Snufkin is born, his parents fuck right off so he has no idea who they were.

Year -10

  • Moomintroll is born.

Year -8

  • Sniff is born, his parents drop him off at Moomins’ and fuck right off.

Year 0

  • Events of Comet in Moominland take place. Moomin is 10, Sniff is 8 (he’s a baby) and Snufkin is 12.
  • Snorkmaiden is also 10 and Sork is 14 (big enough to take care of himself and his sister, not big enough to be above playing with kids).

Year 1

  • Events of Finn Family Moomintroll take place.
  • Moominpappa writes his memoirs, also long lost parents arrive to reunite with their children.
  • Little My (20) first appears in the Moominvalley, visiting with her mum and siblings (34 plus Mymble junior - we know their number fortunately, and with our assumption they are like a radiocarbon).
  • If you’re curious: Moominparents are 35, Joxter is 40, Mymble senior is in her 50s and Mymble junior is 35, The Muddler and The Fuzzy are 36.

Year 2

  • Events of Moominsummer Maddness and Moominland Winter take place. 
  • Moomintroll and Snorkmaiden  are 12, Snufkin is 14 (really young age to become a dad), Little My is 21 and Mymble is 36.

Year 3

  • Events of Tales from Moominvalley take place.
  • Moomintroll and Snorkmaiden are 13, Snufkin is 15, Sniff is 11, Little My is 22.

Year 4

  • Events of Moominpappa at Sea and Moominvalley in November take place.
  • Moomintroll is 14, Moominparents are 38, Snufkin is 16, Little My is 23 and Mymble is 38.

trail.content_raw:
Assumptions made:

  1. Trolls and other sentient creatures age like humans.
  2. Mymble procreates at an averaged rate of 1 offspring per year.
  3. The ages of characters are arbitrarily established by me, but I tried to make them as reasonable as possible.
  4. Year 0 is the year of Comet in Moominland.

Year -34

  • Moominpappa found at the threshold of Hemulen aunt’s orphanage.

  • The Muddler is 16 (he seems quite immature, but I guess you can get married at 16 if you live in  a lawless place). Same goes for The Fuzzy.
  • The Joxter is 20 (that’s my personal opinion).
  • Fredrikson/Hodgkins is in his 30s.
  • Mymble junior is 15 (she has 14 younger siblings).
  • Mymble senior is somewhere in her 30s, depending on at what age she had Mymble.
  • Little My is born this year.
  • I guess Moominmamma is also like 15.

Year -12

  • Snufkin is born, his parents fuck right off so he has no idea who they were.

Year -10

  • Moomintroll is born.

Year -8

  • Sniff is born, his parents drop him off at Moomins’ and fuck right off.

  • Events of Comet in Moominland take place. Moomin is 10, Sniff is 8 (he’s a baby) and Snufkin is 12.
  • Snorkmaiden is also 10 and Sork is 14 (big enough to take care of himself and his sister, not big enough to be above playing with kids).

  • Events of Finn Family Moomintroll take place.
  • Moominpappa writes his memoirs, also long lost parents arrive to reunite with their children.
  • Little My (20) first appears in the Moominvalley, visiting with her mum and siblings (34 plus Mymble junior - we know their number fortunately, and with our assumption they are like a radiocarbon).
  • If you’re curious: Moominparents are 35, Joxter is 40, Mymble senior is in her 50s and Mymble junior is 35, The Muddler and The Fuzzy are 36.

  • Events of Moominsummer Maddness and Moominland Winter take place. 
  • Moomintroll and Snorkmaiden  are 12, Snufkin is 14 (really young age to become a dad), Little My is 21 and Mymble is 36.
